Articles.Content: Does anyone know what altitude KSO orbits occur at? Also, what\'s the rotational period of Kerbin?

> 
> Does anyone know what altitude KSO orbits occur at? Also, what\'s the rotational period of Kerbin?

i believe it is 2844km above Kerbin, but i am unsure

[http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Kerbin](http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Kerbin)

(and for something a bit out of date at the moment: [http://184.154.141.114/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Kerbin](http://184.154.141.114/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Kerbin))
Wow! thank you all for the quick replies. This will make my planned com sat array much easier. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
